University of North Carolina in chapel hill *■ North Carolina State College of Agriculture and Engineering in raleich * The Woman’s College in Greensboro
JOHN YOUNG
Director of fTRevision
CHAPEL HILL
April 1, 1965
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Vice President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington, D. C.
Dear Harold:
Thank you for your letter of March 31st, I think! But seriously,
I'm sorry that we took the action we did with respect to the television
representative - if I was going to conduct the election, I should have
read the Constitution and By-Laws first.
In any event, as you note, it is a matter for Messrs. Etheridge,
Johnston, Petersen and Mrs. Newman to resolve. I'll send them copies
of this letter as a way of saying that if I can help I'll be glad to but will
otherwise assume that they, of course, will take whatever action is
needed within the region.
With best wishes,
Sincerely,
J®hn Young
